title: Olena Zelenska - Wikipedia
snippet: On 11 September 2020, at the initiative of the President's wife, Ukraine joined the Biarritz Partnership, undertaking commitments in the areas of gender equality and the development of barrier-free public space.

title: Meet Olena Zelenska, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's wife: Their high-school love story - The Times of India
snippet: SAINT-LAURENT-SUR-MER, FRANCE - JUNE 6: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and his wife Olena Zelenska arrive at the official international ceremony to mark the 80th anniversary of D-Day, at Omaha Beach on June 6, 2024 in Saint-Laurent-sur-Mer, ...

title: WHO IS OLENA ZELENSKA?: Untold Facts About Ukraine’s First Lady and Wife of President Volodymyr Zelensky: BALTIC PRESS, INDEPENDENT: 9798824570717: Amazon.com: Books
snippet: She is well-known in Ukraine as the wife of President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Also, Olena is now serving as Ukraine's First Lady, an honorary role she has held since May 2019. She's also a writer, having penned the screenplays for a number of films and television shows. As an added bonus, Zelenska is a co-founder of the production business Kvartal 95. After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, she rose to prominence. She has the courage to speak up for her spouse and her family.

title: Who Is Olena Zelenska? Meet President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Wife Who Is The First Lady Of Ukraine
snippet: The Ukrainian President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, is married to Olena Zelenska, who is the First Lady of Ukraine. The couple got married on September 6, 2003, and are currently parents of two children, a son named Kyrylo and a daughter named Oleksandra.
